--- permalink: / title: "" excerpt: "" author_profile: true redirect_from: - /about/ - /about.html --- {% if site.google_scholar_stats_use_cdn %} {% assign gsDataBaseUrl = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/" | append: site.repository | append: "@" %} {% else %} {% assign gsDataBaseUrl = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/" | append: site.repository | append: "/" %} {% endif %} {% assign url = gsDataBaseUrl | append: "google-scholar-stats/gs_data_shieldsio.json" %} I am currently a second-year Master's student at the NLP Lab at Fudan University, under the guidance of Prof. Xipeng Qiu. I graduated from Huazhong University of Science and Technology with a bachelor's degree in software engineering. My current research focuses on unified multimodal LLMs and representation models. Feel free to contact me via email at jzhan22@m.fudan.edu.cn. My research interest includes neural machine translation and computer vision. I have published more than 100 papers at the top international AI conferences with total google scholar citations 260000+ (You can also use google scholar badge ). # ğŸ”¥ News - *2022.02*:  ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
